title: Possible Skarner bug
body:
Hey Riot

I was playing skarner yesterday in the nemesis draft, the first game he was fine, the second game something went wrong

After having the 3 stacks of crystaline venom on a target he lost all his attack speed, it went down to like 0.21 or something also he lost movement speed and stopped basic attacking that target and stood there

like i said had no problem in the first game only the second

replies.body:
I actually had this happen to me once in mid lane when I was walking through it. I didn't notice the attack speed loss though.

Also in the same game I was randomly stuck to the terrain or something because for a good 2 - 3 seconds I was just stuck there (I hadn't been CC'd by anyone).
